member.summary: Represents the Verbose log level. This log level is intended to track the general progress of applications at a fine-grained level.

member.name: F:Gurock.SmartInspect.Level.Message
member.summary: Represents the Message log level. This log level is intended to track the general progress of applications at a coarse-grained level.

member.name: F:Gurock.SmartInspect.Level.Warning
member.summary: Represents the Warning log level. This log level designates potentially harmful events or situations.

member.name: F:Gurock.SmartInspect.Level.Error
member.summary: Represents the Error log level. This log level designates error events or situations which are not critical to the entire system. This log level thus describes recoverable or less important errors.

member.name: F:Gurock.SmartInspect.Level.Fatal
member.summary: Represents the Fatal log level. This log level designates errors which are not recoverable and eventually stop the system or application from working.

member.name: F:Gurock.SmartInspect.Level.Control
member.summary: This log level represents a special log level which is only used by the ControlCommand class and is not intended to be used directly.
